entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a close friend of Harry's. He is described as being able to make himself heard over the babble in the bar.

entities.name: doris crockford
entities.description: Doris Crockford is someone who shakes Harry's hand one last time before Hagrid leads them out of the bar.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and a student at Hogwarts. He is described as being famous and having many people wanting to meet him.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is a teacher at Hogwarts who is described as being nervous and scared of his own subject.

entities.name: black forest
entities.description: The Black Forest is a location where Professor Quirrell met vampires during his year off from studying.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Harry are close friends, as evidenced by Hagrid's familiarity with Harry and his willingness to help him.
Professor Quirrell visited the Black Forest during his year off from studying, where he met vampires.
